DOC.detailed_description: INTRODUCTION It unusual find stone lacrimal sac dacryocystorhinostomy ( DCR ) . Although patient dacryolithiasis often history long-term intermittent epiphora , lacrimal sac distention , and/or partial obstruction nasolacrimal duct ( NLD ) , dacryoliths often detect DCR . The incidence dacryoliths lacrimal sac patient undergo DCR range 6.0-18.0 % ; however , incidence dacryoliths evaluate general population . Unfortunately , publish study dacryoliths include quite small number sample . Canalicular concretion long associate canaliculitis cause actinomycotic infection . However , despite recent , significant progress , understand pathophysiology lacrimal sac dacryoliths still miss . Several predispose factor suggest contribute mechanism give rise dacryolith formation . These factor include age ( 50 year old ) , sex ( increased frequency female ) , cigarette smoking , previous occurrence chronic dacryocystitis primary acquire nasolacrimal duct obstruction ( PANDO ) . Recent analysis show dacryolith development may relate lacrimal sac epithelial NLD production broad spectrum mucin expression two peptide member trefoil factor family ( TFF ) , TFF1 TFF3 . Because dacryoliths occur low frequency , study focus composition . In study , author aim present finding morphological , chemical , mineralogic analysis 86 dacryoliths . MATERIALS AND METHODS A total 967 primary EDCRs perform Department Otorhinolaryngology University Hospital Ostrava Department Otorhinolaryngology Frydek-Mistek City Hospital 1994 April 2012 . Only EDCRs perform postsaccal stenosis/obstruction ( 832 procedure ) include study . Exclusion criteria presaccal obstruction treatment , revision EDCRs , incomplete follow-up . The study perform accordance Declaration Helsinki , Good Clinical Practice , applicable regulatory requirement . Written consent obtain patient initiation surgery dacryolith analysis . Among group 832 EDCRs , 86 stone lacrimal sac ( dacryoliths ) find , include 61/86 ( 70.9 % ) woman 25/86 ( 29.1 % ) men . Clinical information obtain patient medical record , include involved side , etiology nasolacrimal duct ( NLD ) obstruction , outcome EDCR one year surgery , size dacryolith , data dacryolith analysis . The investigator also perform infrared spectrometry , amino acid analysis , image morphological analysis scan electronic microscope . The association cigarette smoking examine . Infrared spectroscopy The author examine dacryoliths Fourier transform infrared spectrometry ( FTIR ; IMPACT 410 , fy Nicolet ) tableting method potassium bromide ( KBr ) . Evaluations perform OMNIC software , obtain spectra compare library spectra kidney stone . Amino acids analysis Proteins sample ( ≤ 20 mg ) hydrolyze hydrochloric acid [ 1,2 ] . Then , 1 mL distil water add , solution filter , evaporate 90 ºC nitrogen , residue dissolve 2 mL 1 % aqueous NaOH . An aliquot ( ~0.5 mg initial sample ) transfer another tube , volume adjust ± 100 µL 1 % NaOH , derivatization perform ethyl chloroformate ( 4 ) . Next , gas chromatography tandem mass spectrometry 7890A MSD5975C ( Agilent ) perform , equip 30-m , VF-17ms capillary column ( 0.25 mm × 0.15 μm ; CP8981 HPST , Praque ) . Samples run temperature ramp 60 300 ºC rate 6 ºC /min ; split injection ( 10:1 ) employ . Electron impact ( EI ) mass spectrometry detection 70 eV perform temperature 230 ºC ion source , 250 ºC transfer line , 150 ºC quad . We perform full-scan analysis helium-carrier gas flow 1.2 mL/min . Imaging morphological analysis Morphological analyse perform scan electron microscope ( QUANTA FEG 450 , FEI Company , WA , USA ) . An electron microprobe energy dispersive detector ( EDS ) use elemental analysis organic matrix stone analysis fine inorganic particulate stone . Statistical analysis For statistical analysis , binomial confidence interval ( CI ) success rate 95 % CI calculate . The two-sample t-test X2 test use evaluate difference age , sex , surgical success group I II ; p < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
